p: The aerial part of T. camphoratus L. was collected from Al Shafa village, 25Â km southwest of Al-Taif city, Southwestern region of Saudi Arabia during spring season in March (2019). After collection, the T. camphoratus samples identity was confirmed by Prof. Ramzi Mothan, Department of Pharmacognosy, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University. A voucher specimen (No. 15848) was deposited in the herbarium of the Department.
